info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of the Position Transfer Orders
info.title: Order Position Transfer Orders Request APIs

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

narratives.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

depositoryId.description: The identifier of the depository. Must be a customerSecurity of type depository.

nomineeTo.description: Nominee code to which the positions are to be transferred

toSubAccount.description: Sub account to which the positions are to be transferred

subAccount.description: The sub-account that the security position is held in.

price.description: The Price at which the NOMINAL.AMOUNT of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

outReferenceCurrency.description: This is the Reference Currency of the Portfolio from where positions are being transferred

inReferenceCurrency.description: This is the Reference Currency of the Portfolio to which the positions are being transferred to

outExchangeRate.description: Specifies the exchange rate applicable between the Local Currency and the Portfolio Reference Currency of the portfolio from where the position has been transferred out

inExchangeRate.description: Specifies the exchange rate applicable between the Local Currency and the Portfolio Reference Currency of the portfolio that the position has been transferred in to

transferDate.description: The transfer date of the transaction

fromPortfolio.description: Specifies the Security Account from which the Transfer is to be made

fromCustodian.description: Specifies the Depository from which the Transfer is to be made

nomineeFrom.description: Nominee code from which the positions are to be transferred

fromSubAccount.description: Sub account from which the positions are to be transferred

toPortfolio.description: Specifies the Security Account to which the Transfer is to be made

toCustodian.description: Specifies the Depository to which the Transfer is to be made

nomineeTo.description: Nominee code to which the positions are to be transferred

selectMovements.description: Provides user the option of changing various details of the security position to be transferred

numberOfPositions.description: The maximum number of positions to be transferred using an online transaction

fundPosition.description: Denotes that the transaction is being performed for transferring fund holdings

segregatedAccount.description: This field is used to determine whether the position transfer is for segregated account

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
